content.p: The Human Resources Department provides support, advice and guidance on all employment issues at the University of Nottingham. Each school or department is supported by several members of the HR team including a dedicated HR adviser and job vacancies are advertised both externally and throughout The University. The HR Policy and Projects Team contributes to the development, implementation and review of a wide range of HR policies and projects, with the aim of introducing best practice solutions for all stakeholders in The University. For further information please visit the Human Resources website.
